definition: a linguistic element added to a word to produce an inflected or derived form, to attach or become attached to a stem word
details:
noun
- a linguistic element added to a word to produce an inflected or derived form
verb
- to attach or become attached to a stem word
= example: to attach or become attached to a stem word
- to add to the very end
= example: to add to the very end
= synonyms: supplement
- to attach to
= example: to attach to
= synonyms: annexe, annex
